overview:
Darryl Wash is the Managing Partner of Ascend. Prior to founding Ascend, Darryl was a Managing Director of Peter J. Solomon Company (PJSC), a New York-based private investment bank. Prior to his tenure with PJSC, Darryl worked in the Investment Banking Division of Goldman, Sachs & Co. Mr. Wash currently serves as a director of VerticalNet, Inc. (NASDAQ: VERT); SchoolNet, Inc.; NextMedium, Inc.; Retention Education, Inc., Tabula Digita, Inc. and SalesEdge, Inc. In addition, Mr. Wash is the treasurer of Do Something, a national youth service not-for-profit organization.

Darryl received an M.B.A. from Stanford Universityâ€™s Graduate School of Business and was named an Arjay Miller Scholar for graduating in the top ten percent of his class. He is also a graduate of the University of California at Berkeley (B.A., Economics) where he graduated with the highest distinction in general scholarship and was elected to Phi Beta Kappa.
